a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Countries in which a woman is government's chief executive, World, 1789 to
Chief executive is head of government or head of state, whoever has more power. This is recorded on December 31 of each
Data source: OWID based on V-Dem (v13)
Note: This is recorded on December 31 of each year.
